org.drip.param.product
Class BondFixedPeriodGenerationParams

java.lang.Object
  org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      org.drip.param.product.BondFixedPeriodGenerationParams
All Implemented Interfaces:
Validatable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BondPeriodGenerationParams
public class BondFixedPeriodGenerationParams
extends Serializer
implements Validatable

This is the place-holder for the generic bond’s period generation parameters. Contains the bond’s date adjustment parameters for period start/end, period accrual start/end, effective, maturity, pay and reset, first coupon date, and interest accrual start date.
